snippet: The Netherlands will suspend all financial aid to the former colony, in protest over its decision to grant amnesty to the suspected killers of 15 opponents of President Desi Bouterse 30 years ago.
abstract: The Netherlands will suspend all financial aid to Suriname, a former Dutch colony in South America, in protest of its decision to grant amnesty to the suspected killers of 15 opponents of President Desi Bouterse 30 years ago.
lead_paragraph: The Netherlands will suspend all financial aid to the former colony, in protest over its decision to grant amnesty to the suspected killers of 15 opponents of President Desi Bouterse 30 years ago.

headline.main: The Netherlands: Aid to Suriname To Be Suspended Over Amnesty
headline.print_headline: The Netherlands: Aid to Suriname To Be Suspended Over Amnesty
